page.title: 13An ordinary weekday
page.content: I get up at {7.30.}I have my breakfast I get dressed and I get my lunch and go to school with my friends karen and Paul and my sister Vicky.Then when I get to school and I take of my coat and get my reading book and I read for {15 minutes.}Then we get on with some work for an hour and we have assembly at {10.15.}At {10.45 }we have break for {15 minutes} till {11.00}.We work till {12.00}.We go out to play and at{ {12.30} we have our lunch .Then at { {1.15 }we work till {2.45.}Then we have the story till {3.15.}T hen it is home time when I get home I have a drink and a biscuit. I go out to play with my friends and at {6.30 }I go to Path Finders I go till {8.00 }.Then I watch televison till {9.30 }and then I go to bed and read for {15 minutes} and go to sleep.
